org.measure.platform.framework.config.locale

Class AngularCookieLocaleResolver

  • java.lang.Object
    • CookieLocaleResolver
      • org.measure.platform.framework.config.locale.AngularCookieLocaleResolver

  • public class AngularCookieLocaleResolver
extends CookieLocaleResolver
    Angular cookie saved the locale with a double quote (%22en%22). So the default CookieLocaleResolver#StringUtils.parseLocaleString(localePart) is not able to parse the locale. This class will check if a double quote has been added, if so it will remove it.
